src:
Z avtom v prometni znak, nato pa v beg
Avtu je odpadla tablica, on pa je pobegnil.
04 Nov 2019, 13:30 by T. K.
SOLKAN – Včeraj ob 21.25 se je v Solkanu zgodila prometna nesreča. Voznik osebnega vozila je na Cesti IX. korpusa trčil v prometni znak in ga poškodoval ter pobegnil. Kot so sporočili iz PU Nova Gorica, je na kraju nesreče ostala registrska tablica vozila. Ko bodo novogoriški policisti izsledili povzročitelja prometne nesreče, mu bo izdan plačilni nalog.
text:
By car to the traffic sign, then to the getaway
The car fell off the plate, and he fled.
04 Nov 2019, 13:30 by T.K.
SOLKAN - A traffic accident happened in Solkan yesterday at 9.25pm. The driver of the passenger car is on Road IX. of the corps collided with a traffic sign and damaged and fled. According to the Nova Gorica Police Station, the vehicle's license plate remained at the scene of the accident. When the police officers in Novi Sad track down the perpetrator of the accident, he will be issued a payment order.
